attempts.raw_output:
Complete the following Lean 4 code:
```lean4
import Mathlib

open Set Nat

noncomputable abbrev putnam_1974_a4_solution : ℕ → ℚ := sorry
-- (fun n ↦ (1 : ℚ) / (2 ^ (n - 1)) * (n * (n - 1).choose ⌊n / 2⌋₊))

/--
Evaluate in closed form: $\frac{1}{2^{n-1}} \sum_{k < n/2} (n-2k)*{n \choose k}$.
-/
theorem putnam_1974_a4
    (n : ℕ)
    (hn : 0 < n) :
    (1 : ℚ) / (2 ^ (n - 1)) * ∑ k ∈ Finset.Icc 0 ⌊n / 2⌋₊, (n - 2 * k) * (n.choose k) =
    putnam_1974_a4_solution n :=
  sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_1974_a4
    (n : ℕ)
    (hn : 0 < n) :
    (1 : ℚ) / (2 ^ (n - 1)) * ∑ k ∈ Finset.Icc 0 ⌊n / 2⌋₊, (n - 2 * k) * (n.choose k) =
    putnam_1974_a4_solution n := by
  rw [putnam_1974_a4_solution]
  <;> induction n with
  | zero => contradiction
  | succ n ih =>
    cases n with
    | zero =>
      norm_num [Nat.choose_succ_succ, Finset.sum_Icc_succ_top, Nat.floor_eq_zero]
    | succ n =>
      simp_all [Nat.choose_succ_succ, Finset.sum_Icc_succ_top, Nat.floor_eq_zero, Nat.div_eq_of_lt]
      <;> field_simp [Nat.cast_add, Nat.cast_mul, Nat.cast_two, Nat.cast_sub, Nat.cast_one] at *
      <;> ring_nf at *
      <;> norm_num
      <;> omega
```

import Mathlib

open Real Nat Topology MeasureTheory
open scoped BigOperators

theorem putnam_1974_a4
    (n : ℕ)
    (hn : 0 < n) :
    (1 : ℚ) / (2 ^ (n - 1)) * ∑ k ∈ Finset.Icc 0 ⌊n / 2⌋₊, (n - 2 * k) * (n.choose k) =
    putnam_1974_a4_solution n := by
  rw [putnam_1974_a4_solution]
  <;> induction n with
  | zero => contradiction
  | succ n ih =>
    cases n with
    | zero =>
      norm_num [Nat.choose_succ_succ, Finset.sum_Icc_succ_top, Nat.floor_eq_zero]
    | succ n =>
      simp_all [Nat.choose_succ_succ, Finset.sum_Icc_succ_top, Nat.floor_eq_zero, Nat.div_eq_of_lt]
      <;> field_simp [Nat.cast_add, Nat.cast_mul, Nat.cast_two, Nat.cast_sub, Nat.cast_one] at *
      <;> ring_nf at *
      <;> norm_num
      <;> omega

attempts.raw_output:
Complete the following Lean 4 code:
```lean4
import Mathlib

open Set Nat

noncomputable abbrev putnam_1974_a4_solution : ℕ → ℚ := sorry
-- (fun n ↦ (1 : ℚ) / (2 ^ (n - 1)) * (n * (n - 1).choose ⌊n / 2⌋₊))

/--
Evaluate in closed form: $\frac{1}{2^{n-1}} \sum_{k < n/2} (n-2k)*{n \choose k}$.
-/
theorem putnam_1974_a4
    (n : ℕ)
    (hn : 0 < n) :
    (1 : ℚ) / (2 ^ (n - 1)) * ∑ k ∈ Finset.Icc 0 ⌊n / 2⌋₊, (n - 2 * k) * (n.choose k) =
    putnam_1974_a4_solution n :=
  sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_1974_a4
    (n : ℕ)
    (hn : 0 < n) :
    (1 : ℚ) / (2 ^ (n - 1)) * ∑ k ∈ Finset.Icc 0 ⌊n / 2⌋₊, (n - 2 * k) * (n.choose k) =
    putnam_1974_a4_solution n := by
  rw [putnam_1974_a4_solution]
  <;> induction n with
  | zero => contradiction
  | succ n ih =>
    cases n with
    | zero =>
      norm_num
      <;> simp [Finset.sum_Icc_succ_top, Nat.choose_succ_succ, Nat.floor_eq_iff]
      <;> norm_num
      <;> field_simp
      <;> ring_nf
      <;> norm_num
    | succ n =>
      simp_all [Finset.sum_Icc_succ_top, Nat.choose_succ_succ, Nat.floor_eq_iff]
      <;> field_simp at *
      <;> ring_nf at *
      <;> norm_num
      <;> omega
```

    cases n with

import Mathlib

open Set Nat

noncomputable abbrev putnam_1974_a4_solution : ℕ → ℚ := sorry
-- (fun n ↦ (1 : ℚ) / (2 ^ (n - 1)) * (n * (n - 1).choose ⌊n / 2⌋₊))

/--
Evaluate in closed form: $\frac{1}{2^{n-1}} \sum_{k < n/2} (n-2k)*{n \choose k}$.
-/
theorem putnam_1974_a4
    (n : ℕ)
    (hn : 0 < n) :
    (1 : ℚ) / (2 ^ (n - 1)) * ∑ k ∈ Finset.Icc 0 ⌊n / 2⌋₊, (n - 2 * k) * (n.choose k) =
    putnam_1974_a4_solution n :=

```lean4
theorem putnam_1974_a4
    (n : ℕ)
    (hn : 0 < n) :
    (1 : ℚ) / (2 ^ (n - 1)) * ∑ k ∈ Finset.Icc 0 ⌊n / 2⌋₊, (n - 2 * k) * (n.choose k) =
    putnam_1974_a4_solution n := by
  rcases n with (_ | _)
  · simp_all [Nat.div_eq_of_lt]
  · simp_all [Nat.div_eq_of_lt]
    <;> induction n with
    | zero =>

      <;> ring_nf at *
      <;> norm_cast at *
      <;> omega
```
